Name: Brix VR
About the game: Brix VR is a simple breakout/arkanoid style game designed for VR. Control the paddle with one hand while using your other hand to collect the power ups by shooting them with lasers! If that doesn't sound fun, I don't know what does! With 50 levels, 15 power ups (or downs), and 4 difficulty levels, Brix VR offers hours of fun, casual gameplay for all ages! 2 different music playlists depending on your mood at the time. Chill or upbeat!
